Deuteronomy__22.6__Thou shalt not take: This was to shew them to exercise a certain mercy even to irrational creatures; and by that means to train them up to a horror of cruelty; and to the exercise of humanity and mutual charity one to another.
Deuteronomy__22.8__Battlement: This precaution was necessary, because all their houses had flat tops, and it was usual to walk and to converse together upon them.
